title: Promotions celebrate our academics’ excellence (The University of Kent)
text: ( Source : The University of Kent ) Over 50 members of Kent's academic staff have been promoted to professor, reader or senior lecturer across our Faculties of Humanities, Sciences and Social Sciences , with effect from 1 October 2015 . The new
